Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface BookingDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingDao
public interface BookingDaoInterface
Interface for booking-related data operations. Defines the methods required for booking management, such as creating bookings, counting slot bookings, retrieving user bookings, and deleting bookings.
Author:
bharadwaj

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    bookedSlotCount(String slotId)
    Retrieves the total count of bookings for a specific slot.
    void
    bookSlot(Booking booking)
    Books a slot by creating a new booking entry in the database.
    void
    deleteSlot(String bookingId)
    Deletes a specific booking from the database based on the booking ID.
    List<Booking>
    getUserBookings(String userId)
    Retrieves a list of bookings made by a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • bookSlot

      void bookSlot(Booking booking)
      Books a slot by creating a new booking entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      booking - The Booking object containing the booking details such as booking ID, user ID, and slot ID.

    • bookedSlotCount

      int bookedSlotCount(String slotId)
      Retrieves the total count of bookings for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot for which the booking count is needed.
      Returns:
      The number of bookings for the specified slot.

    • getUserBookings

      List<Booking> getUserBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects representing the bookings made by the user.

    • deleteSlot

      void deleteSlot(String bookingId)
      Deletes a specific booking from the database based on the booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be deleted.
